SimpleMacLayer.cc

00001 #include "SimpleMacLayer.h"
00002 
00003 #include "Mapping.h"
00004 #include "FindModule.h"
00005 #include "MacToPhyInterface.h"
00006 #include "MacToPhyControlInfo.h"
00007 #include "MacPkt_m.h"
00008 
00009 using std::endl;
00010 
00011 Define_Module(SimpleMacLayer);
00012 
00013 //---omnetpp part----------------------
00014 
00015 //---intialisation---------------------
00016 void SimpleMacLayer::initialize(int stage) {
00017   BaseModule::initialize(stage);
00018 
00019   if(stage == 0) {
00020     myIndex = findHost()->getIndex();
00021 
00022     dimensions.addDimension(Dimension::time);
00023     dimensions.addDimension(Dimension::frequency);
00024 
00025     dataOut = findGate("lowerLayerOut");
00026     dataIn  = findGate("lowerLayerIn");
00027 
00028     phy = FindModule<MacToPhyInterface*>::findSubModule(this->getParentModule());
00029 
00030   } else if(stage == 1) {
00031     if(myIndex == 0){ //host with index 0 start with sending packets
00032       log("Switching radio to TX...");
00033       nextReceiver = 1;
00034       phy->setRadioState(Radio::TX); //to be able to send packets it has to switch to TX mode
00035 
00036     }else{ //every other host start in receiving mode
00037       log("Switching radio to RX...");
00038       phy->setRadioState(Radio::RX);
00039     }
00040     //switching the radio can take some time,
00041     //we will get a "RADIO_SWITCHING_OVER" message as soon as the radio has switched.
00042   }
00043 }
00044 
00045 void SimpleMacLayer::handleMessage(cMessage* msg) {
00046 
00047   //what to do if the radio has switched
00048   if(msg->getKind() == MacToPhyInterface::RADIO_SWITCHING_OVER) {
00049     log("...switching radio done.");
00050 
00051     switch(phy->getRadioState()) {
00052     case Radio::TX:     //if we switched to TX mode we probably wanted to send
00053       broadCastPacket();  //an answer packet
00054       break;
00055     default:
00056       break;
00057     }
00058     delete msg;
00059 
00060   //forward MacPackets and TX_OVER to their own handling routine
00061   } else if (msg->getKind() == TEST_MACPKT) {
00062     handleMacPkt(static_cast<MacPkt*>(msg));
00063   } else if(msg->getKind() == MacToPhyInterface::TX_OVER) {
00064     handleTXOver();
00065     delete msg;
00066   }
00067 
00068 }
00069 
00070 void SimpleMacLayer::handleTXOver() {
00071   //the TX_Over message is sent by the phy to us to indicate that
00072   //the sending process is over. SO we will switch back to receiving
00073   //mode after that.
00074   log("Transmission over signal from PhyLayer received. Changing back to RX");
00075   phy->setRadioState(Radio::RX);
00076 }
00077 
00078 void SimpleMacLayer::handleMacPkt(MacPkt* pkt) {
00079 
00080   //if we got a Mac packet check if it was for us or not.
00081   if(pkt->getDestAddr() == LAddress::L2Type(myIndex)){
00082     log("Received MacPkt for me - broadcasting answer (but first change to TX mode)");
00083     if(myIndex == 0)
00084       nextReceiver = 1;
00085     else
00086       nextReceiver = 0;
00087 
00088     //if the destination of the packet was us, send an answer packet->switch to sending mode
00089     phy->setRadioState(Radio::TX);
00090   }else
00091     log("Received MacPkt - but not for me.");
00092 
00093   delete pkt;
00094 
00095 }
00096 
00097 void SimpleMacLayer::log(std::string msg) {
00098   ev << "[Host " << myIndex << "] - MacLayer: " << msg << endl;
00099 }
00100 
00101 void SimpleMacLayer::broadCastPacket() {
00102   //create the answer packet of length 64kByte / 11kByte/sec
00103   MacPkt* pkt = createMacPkt(64.0 / 11000.0);
00104 
00105   log("Sending broadcast packet to phy layer.");
00106   //pass it to the phy layer
00107   sendDown(pkt);
00108 }
00109 
00110 void SimpleMacLayer::sendDown(MacPkt* pkt) {
00111   send(pkt, dataOut);
00112 }
00113 
00114 Mapping* SimpleMacLayer::createMapping(simtime_t_cref time, simtime_t_cref length, double freqFrom, double freqTo, double value){
00115   //create mapping for frequency and time
00116   Mapping* m = MappingUtils::createMapping(Argument::MappedZero, dimensions, Mapping::LINEAR);
00117 
00118   //set position Argument
00119   Argument pos(dimensions, time);
00120   pos.setArgValue(Dimension("frequency"), freqFrom);
00121   //set mapping at position
00122   m->setValue(pos, value);
00123 
00124   pos.setTime(time + length);
00125   //set mapping at position
00126   m->setValue(pos, value);
00127 
00128   pos.setArgValue(Dimension("frequency"), freqTo);
00129   //set mapping at position
00130   m->setValue(pos, value);
00131 
00132   pos.setTime(time);
00133   //set mapping at position
00134   m->setValue(pos, value);
00135 
00136 
00137 
00138   return m;
00139 }
00140 
00141 MacPkt* SimpleMacLayer::createMacPkt(simtime_t_cref length) {
00142   //create signal with start at current simtime and passed length
00143   Signal* s = new Signal(simTime(), length);
00144 
00145   //create and set tx power mapping
00146   Mapping* txPower = createMapping(simTime(), length, 2.412e9, 2.472e9, 50.0);
00147   s->setTransmissionPower(txPower);
00148 
00149   //create and set bitrate mapping
00150   Mapping* bitrate = createMapping(simTime(), length, 2.412e9, 2.472e9, 54.0);
00151   s->setBitrate(bitrate);
00152 
00153   //create and initialize control info
00154   MacPkt* res = new MacPkt();
00155   MacToPhyControlInfo::setControlInfo(res, s);
00156   res->setKind(TEST_MACPKT);
00157   res->setDestAddr(LAddress::L2Type(nextReceiver));
00158   return res;
00159 }
